tutorials.title: Python Automation for Maya Character Rigging
tutorials.subtitle: Advanced Scripting
tutorials.description: Learn how to automate repetitive character rigging tasks in Maya using Python. This comprehensive guide covers creating custom tools, batch processing, and building efficient workflows for creature and character setup.

tutorials.title: Creature Design Workflow in Blender
tutorials.subtitle: Modeling & Sculpting
tutorials.description: A complete workflow for creating detailed creature designs in Blender. From initial concept sculpting to final model optimization, including retopology, texturing, and rendering techniques specifically for fantasy creatures.

tutorials.title: Building a Digital Anatomy Reference System
tutorials.subtitle: Organization & Reference
tutorials.description: Create an efficient digital library for anatomical references using Python scripts and database management. Perfect for concept artists who need quick access to creature anatomy, proportions, and structural references.

tutorials.title: Advanced ZBrush Techniques for Character Detail
tutorials.subtitle: Digital Sculpting
tutorials.description: Master advanced ZBrush workflows for adding intricate details to your creature designs. Covers custom brushes, advanced masking techniques, and efficient detail workflows for production-ready assets.

tutorials.title: Custom Pipeline Automation Tools
tutorials.subtitle: Technical Solutions
tutorials.description: Build custom tools to streamline your art production pipeline. Learn to create batch processors, file organizers, and automated export tools that save hours of manual work in your daily workflow.
